welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Naugatuck, a charming town known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Waterbury-Oxford Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments and freight services.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport caters to the needs of private jet and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brainard Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brainard Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
